name: AUUKA
description: In this game, you have to play as an independent journalist who evaluates abandoned villages and cities, he saw one of these villages on the road, curiosity got the best of him and decided to stop by and see it. Studying the village, he slowly learns the history of this place. P.S. Game control W, A, S, D, and mouse. When you see the icon clock you should click the left button on the mouse and hold a few seconds. If you choose the first house it is a good ending to the game. Try to choose another house and try to search for hidden items.
